prereg
Class PreRegServer

java.lang.Object
  prereg.PreRegServer

public class PreRegServer
extends java.lang.Object

Pre Registration Server. Accepts browser "form" for registering Team Names and Passwords.

PreRegServer

Create a PreRegServer with the given Teams. Pre-registration sets Player/Team Passwords for future competitions.
